channel.title: How do i take out the quests i don't want on my server
channel.description:
Ok so i have my server up and running i am just coding it and i see that it has 4 quests::
1. Dessert Treasure 2. Lunar Diplomacy 3. Lunar Spirit 4. Knight's Legend
Theses are the 4 quests. I don't know how to get rid of them i tried by Changing their name in TextHandler. But when i changed it and still clicked on it, it still said the quest name and other quest Info. Like what to do to complete the quest.
So if you know how to get rid of them for good please replay with a good explanation. Thanks, pictures would be nice:) By the way it is a 317 Delta. --SayBy100---

item.title: How do i take out the quests i don't want on my server
item.dc:creator: @say_bye100 say bye100
item.description:
@say_bye100 wrote:

where do i put that because rite now this is what i have…

public class textHandler {
public void startText(int ID) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
c.sendQuest(“Beastly Scape Highscores”, 6399);
c.sendQuest(" @or1@MY SERVER NAME HERE", 640);

[size=x-large]All the qests were right here… i deleted them… now i want to add my message to the players.[/size]

}
if(c.q12 == 0){
c.sendQuest("", 7383);
}
if(c.q12 > 0){
c.sendQuest("@yel@", 7383);
}
if(c.q12 == 15){
c.sendQuest("@gre@", 7383);

Read full topic
